case.state: Hello, everyone. I hope I didn't keep you waiting.
I'm Sanako Isogai, present and eager to get started!
Yes, this is the place! Or so I'm told, anyway.
Tr-Traffic inside?! Watch out!
M-Maybe it wasn't a good idea to play right here. A car wants to get through.
Hello! Who's this? Not someone I've met before, that's for sure! Ehehe...
(I think that's Nagisa's school friend? ...Fujibayashi, I think?)
Welcome! And look, she even brought an extra pair of hands! I could sure use those around the house.
Is that two newcomers we see? What a cute couple.
Oh, wow. Somebody's arriving in style!
Oooh, a big strong man has come out to play.
Who do we have here? A big hunk, it looks like.
Oh, what a beauty. I hope you don't mind me saying that.
No need to be shy, ~name~. You can get a little bit closer if you like.
You can get closer if you want to, ~name~. Don't worry, I don't bite.
Do you think Nagisa saw through my disguise?
Don't you think you could have given poor Nagisa a nicer welcome? I'm sure it took all her courage just to come here.
If I may say so, ma'am, you're in amazing shape for having a grown up daughter. I know that can't have been easy, but I'm sure you're as lively as the day you were eighteen.
What scary wings. You all put a lot of effort into your costumes, didn't you?
Is that a flying robot?
What a merry atmosphere we have here.
It's so very nice to make your acquaintance!
Let's all get along, okay?
I'll take ~cards.text~ cards, please.
Could I have ~cards.text~?
I only need ~cards.text~ cards.
~Cards.text~ cards would be lovely.
May I have ~cards.text~ cards?
I should be able to get by with ~cards.text~ cards.
Sorry to be picky, but could I have ~cards.text~ new cards?
Count me in for ~cards.text~!
Might I trouble you for ~cards.text~ cards?
Let me check. Hmmm. ~cards.text~, please.
I'm sorry, could I have ~cards.text~ cards?
All right, ~cards.text~ cards for me.
~Cards.text~, please.
I think ~cards.text~ should be enough.
~Cards.text~ cards, if you please.
I'll have an order of ~cards.text~.
I must have ~cards.text~ new cards for this hand.
I'll try exchanging ~cards.text~ cards.
~Cards.text~ new cards, please.
Just two for me, please.
It looks like just one card will be enough.
Maybe there's a different future ahead for me after all.
You have to get up pretty early in the morning to outsmart a baker!
I'm on a roll!
As a little surprise for you all, I made some baked goodies to eat after the game.
Wow!
Life's just more fun when you bluff a little.
Well, my! This is a good hand, isn't it?
Don't worry about me. I just got lucky, that's all.
I'm not telling you what I got yet. You'll just have to find out.
Sorry, but I came to play!
I'll take a win wherever I can find one.
This might be the coolest I've ever felt.
Yay!
You all get to admire my skirt for another round!
I'm going to keep my secrets to myself.
Good.
You sure are paying me a lot of attention, ~player~.
You're so polite and well-mannered, Mei.
I love your dancing, Shantae. You are so energetic!
Okay!
I don't need to win, but it's nice to have fate smile on me once in a while.
Maybe if you can beat me, I'll let you keep these panties as a little souvenir.
Yes!
Look at that. The power to keep on going.
What if I ran the shop like this one morning. Wouldn't it cause quite a stir?
I keep getting lucky, but here I am willing to go all the way.
I'm not one to complain. Not right now, anyway.
Is somebody trying to keep me covered up? I need these about as much as I need a Bengal monitor lizard down my blouse. Which is not at all.
If I remember right, I just have to match two or more of the same numbers together.
It's a match.
Let's go around the table and show each other what we have.
Good things come to those who wait.
You'd better watch out. I might try to get away with something.

Isn't this uniform cute?
And it fits me so well.
You don't have to wait for me. I'm ready.
I'll be here, no matter what.
I think I've got all the ingredients I need.
I can tell I'm going to like it here.
I sure got a lot of attention walking here today. I should do this more often.
I don't do my hair in braids very often. Do you like it?
This is the most fun I've had in ages.
I do my best to be patient whenever I can. I just hope you're willing to wait for me.
I don't get many chances to really get to know new people, so this is such a treat for me.
Isn't this just the perfect way to unwind after a hard week?
The concept behind this hand is the word "calmness".
This is a fun group, isn't it? We've all got a lot to share.
I don't mind how this goes. I'm just having fun being here.
This is such a pretty bra. And the material feels so comfortable too. I should wear it more often.
Anyone else feel like they just need to do something crazy or they'll go crazy?
I don't suppose anyone wants to give me a shoulder massage?
I'm sure you'd like to know my cup size. Too bad. That's a secret.
Don't count me out too quickly.
I'm ready.
You really want this game to last, don't you? That's an appealing quality in ~player.ifMale(a man|a lover)~, you know?
Geez, I'm not used to being leered at so much...
I don't suppose anyone here is looking for an after-school tutor.
Who keeps giving me these good cards?
Sorry to keep you all waiting, but I keep getting pairs.
It's fun playing this with a younger guy. The faces they make are so cute.
Does anyone else have their eyes on a nice pair?
I hope we all have something to show.
It's not time for me to show you everything, but I'm sure your patience will be rewarded.
Wouldn't you agree that seeing me like this is already like winning?
Sorry if my boobies jiggle when I laugh. I just can't help it.
We just have to let the cards decide, don't we?
You can't expect a girl to give up all her secrets, can you?
Wouldn't you like to know what I have in store for you...
I can't help but notice that you can't keep your eyes off me, ~player~.
May the best woman win.
Young people still do dance challenges, right? Because I can bust a few moves myself, you know.
If anybody has any compliments for me, I'd love to hear them.
I'll pull myself together by my bootstraps.
I try to take care of myself. Can you tell?
There's nothing unnatural about the human body. It just depends on how you use it.
Don't feast your eyes too much. You should save room for dessert.
Anyone want to let me have a little peek at their cards?
So who's the girl to beat, do you think? Who has the most experience?
I hope you're not reading my mind. I have some off-limits thoughts in there, okay?
I've had a terrible game! I'm useless!
Oh dear! I might be the very first one to lose.
Wait, am I going to be the instructor today?
You all sure are eager...
Sorry, everyone! I'll be out of these panties in just a moment.
Oh dear!
You might be seeing the inside of my lingerie before long.
I'm not normally the center of attention. But I'm not normally standing here in my undies either, ehehe...
I'm useless!
I know I shouldn't be disappointed, but I wanted to hold on a little longer.
It's a bit too late for me to be nervous. How unexpected!
What kind of outcome are we hoping for?
We don't need to be scared of a little storm on the horizon.
This is tougher than it looks. But so am I.
I'm always giving everything I have. To~background.time~ is no exception, it seems.
I may have messed that one up on purpose. Don't tell anyone, okay?
It's almost time I showed you what's under this shirt.
What's life without a few stumbles, right?
That'll teach me to take a big risk, ehehe...
Hmmm...
Oooh.
Ehehe... I made a little mistake.
I see.
Oh...
I've got good news for you if you were starting to get a little crush on me.
Just a moment. I have to adjust myself a little...
W-We're on the cusp of a big reveal. Let's not dillydally.
Ah...
Um...
My life has been blessing after blessing. It's only right that I give back however I can.
Oops!
Don't copy me if you want to win. Apparently I don't know anything.
Would you hit on a girl with glasses?
I have this burning desire...
Nagisa with a little bundle of joy. The thought just makes my heart melt.

condition.saying: Has anyone told you that you two look very alike? Like if you were sisters.

case.state: Do you really think so, Elizabeth? Of course any girl would be lucky to be as cute as Nagisa.
Ehehe! Nagisa, that's my little secret!

condition.saying: I even take work on Christmas and New Year

case.state: December is busy for us too, Kyoko, but our customers know the bakery closes between Christmas and New Year. It's one of the few times we get a chance to sleep in!
Don't worry, Nagisa. The door is locked. I checked it myself.
Oh, no, I don't live anywhere near the big city, May. I live in smal town, so I had to take the train here.
Oh, no, I live in Japan, not France! I only know a few French words, so finding my way here was a little bit more challenging than I expected.
Not me, May. I don't get up to the mountains very often, but it sure is beautiful here, isn't it?
I... I don't remember, May. I thought this was just a spooky dream, so I'm going to make the most of it.
Of course! This is the school my daug--- ah, I mean, this is the school I go to. It's up a very steep hill, but it's still within walking distance of home.
I can't blame you for feeling nostalgic. Sneaking around the corridors, trying not to get seen by a teacher... those are things you just can't do anymore in the adult world.
Don't tell anyone, Senko, but I have an irrational fear of Bengal monitor lizards. I know they're a part of the animal kingdom, but I just don't want them crawling around on my body...
Uhhh... I don't think they'd be able to do that, Mari. The last thing a business like this wants to do it run afoul of the health inspector.
Of course, Nagisa! Your fath--- I mean, my boyfriend and I went to the city and took a romantic walk through the snow to see the lights at night. It was an unforgettable experience.
That's so generous of you, Mrs. Moon. I wonder if I could generate some community interest if I gave out a free tastings of my hot buns.

condition.saying: cards with the people or the numbers on them

case.state: Just think of it this way, Moskii: age is just a number, so what really matters is the person. And if you get a pair of compatible cards, it's like a little romance right in your hand.
Oh, that's a nasty one! It must've been so deep. There must be some way we can let you see too, Rose. Does anyone here have a Polaroid camera?
It's nice to meet you, Joetta. You can call me Sanako.
Even if you've seen everything someone has to show, there are still ways to spice things up, Nagatoro. You'll see.
Oh my. That's terrible that ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ followed you all the way here. We have our eye on you, ~player.ifMale(buster|missy)~, so don't try any funny business.
What a kind girl you are Nadeshiko.
We're all here to strip. Rose and I are just giving you a little taste of what's in store.
Don't give up! There's still a lot worth working for.
I have to say I was a little shocked to hear your secret. But it doesn't matter if you're a boy or a girl. Chihiro is Chihiro, right?
Then how would you feel if we added something magical to your name? How about "Kumatora Eternal"?
Oh, my. It's not enough for you just to melt hearts, Kyouko. You want to break some too.

state.text: Of course, Lady Jakuzure. I'd be happy to call you by whatever name you'd like. But you can still call me "Sanako" if that's okay.

case.state: Your dad says a lot of silly things, but he was just teasing you, Nagisa. Not that I've met your dad. It's just that my dad used to tease me a lot too, you know?
Now, now. Let's not resort to violence, okay?
N-No, definitely not, Jessie! Why, what have you heard?
If nobody gets hurt, then it's just a bit of fun, right? Of course, if you get caught out, you should apologize and do everything you can to make it up to that person.
Just because I don't love smoking doesn't mean I can't love a smoker very much. Is that what you meant, Jessie?
Oh, that's a good question, Jessie... There are so many things we need around the house. And... and I wouldn't mind a few new dresses.
Jessie, I think that as long as the person is trying to move forward and not repeat what they did, there's no need to punish them. I'm sure that person has sufferered enough.
Family couldn't be any more important to me, Jessie! After all, isn't is every parent's dream to see their child live out their own dream?
I was able to walk here to~background.time~. Did some of you come by train? The station isn't too far from here.

S-Sure, that's one way to do it, Mari. But why not consider baking for him next time? You can make some one-of-a-kind memories in the kitchen, plus that way he can tell all his friends about what you did too.

Call me old-fashioned if you like, but I still marvel at the dishwasher! When I was a little girl, we never owned one, but it's been such a lifesaver when running my own home. Does that answer your question, Senko?
For me, Senko, I love spending a day in the countryside with my family. It's so nice to get away from work and all my other duties. And I get to connect with my dearest friends.
This is my first time meeting a kitsune. If I can say so, you're a lot cuter than I imagined.
I agree, Senko. There's no better way to fill your own heart than to fill someone else's.
Wow, when it comes to being older than you look, you're the world champ, Senko! I'm glad you're using your time a bit more productively now.

There used to be a few more shrines near where I live, but they'd been slipping away recently, replaced by new construction. I'm sorry for all of the little fox spirits that rely on them. I didn't know.

Even if it's not for work, Mari, you should still try hard in school. It might not seem like it now, but expanding your horizons can open up so many opportunities when you're still young. If you wait too long, you might regret it.
Of course, Mari! It's such a joy playing with everyone!
Oh, are we really sharing intimate secrets like that to~background.time~, are we? O-Okay... Have... have you ever heard of the "wheelbarrow" position, Mari? That's definitely the one I enjoy most...
Ehehe! You're so playful, Mari. I'm glad you're having fun with this too.
I'm glad you made it here safely, Fujibayashi. Do be careful on the bends, okay? Some of the students on the footpath aren't very quick on their feet.
Oh, I might have seen your boar on the way here, Fujibayashi. But the one I saw was a plushie, I think. If I knew he belonged to you, I would have brought him along.
A moms-only brunch sounds wonderful. I... I should hurry up and become a mom too so I can join you.

If you have children, Jessie, than I think lights off is safer. Then there's less to see if a little one walks in by accident. But, um, my preference is lights on. If my dearest tells me I'm pretty, I want to know he means today, not when we first met.
Of course not, Jessie. Actually... I've only had one partner. And I've always been faithful.
I... I don't know abou that, Jessie. If he was just seeing them, um, well that's kind of what I'm doing now. But I think it would be wrong to go any further than a little playful flirting.
Ah, that's kind of private, Jessie. Not never, but my husb--- um, my lover doesn't let the bed get too cold, you know?
I'm sorry, Jessie, but that's not my area of expertise. But I did confiscate some magazines off some kids in the park one time. The ladies of the covers were so voluptuous.

Id-Ideally... I don't know if I could pick a number, Jessie. But my schedule is so full running a business and teaching little ones in the afternoon that it doesn't leave time as much as I might like...

I don't think I've ever met someone so direct as you, Jessie. But you did ask, so it'd be rude not to answer. Do you know the "wheelbarrow" position. It's... it's not very practical, but it can be a lot of fun...
Ehehe, I know what you're getting at, Jessie. We don't use the back door at my house, but sometimes we go through the front door from the back, if you know what I mean.
You mean like someone who might not be completely honest about who they are or what they do, Arash? N-No... I can't think of anyone like that.

Hmmmm, that's a toughie. Both places are beautiful, but I think I'd like to spend a few days by the beach next. I bought such a cute swimsuit a few seasons ago, and nobody's seem me in it! Somebody has to praise me before it doesn't fit anymore, ehehe....
I don't know the names of many Pokémon, but I'd want to be that red dragon one. Graaaah! Ehehe!
Have you read "Be With You" by Takuji Ichikawa, Yuri? Once I picked it up, I just wasn't able to put it down! Such a sweet and heartwarming story.
You really made sure we knew you were enjoying yourself, Jessie. I might've picked up a few tips to use at home.
Uh, that's okay, Jessie. I don't think it's for me. But thanks for the free sample.

I'm glad you asked, Nadeshiko. While looks are nice, they don't last forever. What's more important is someone who is kind and trustworthy and a good provider. That's the kind of person you can build a life with.
Good for you, Nadeshiko! I wish more young people would follow your example. It can be a lot of work, but filling your family's bellies with a warm meal is something to be proud of.
I think that's just an expression, Mr. Fate. It would be incredibly painful to give birth to a baby wearing sleeves or any other clothing.
Is that what the kids are calling them these days? The girls in my class used to call them "press-on nails". Some girls had such long ones that they could hardly hold a pencil.
You don't just go out to eat ramen every time your hungry, do you? We can't have that. You should come back to my house, and I'll make you a home-cooked meal.
That's a beautiful scarf, young lady. It goes wonderfully with your lovely blonde hair.
Some of you really went all out on your costumes! The ladybird girl is very pretty.
Don't you dare pick on Nagisa anymore, you hear? Give someone else a turn.
Aw, what a cutie patootie! I'm sure it's as perfect as the day you were born, Nagatoro.
That is an amazing bodysuit, D.Va. I could never wear it as well as you can. You could be a swimsuit model.
Lady in purple, that's a daring look! Do you think a strapless bra would look good on me too?
Lady in purple, that's a daring look! I don't have anything that lets me show off my shoulders quite like that.
Dressing as a pirate was a good idea. Maybe I should have done that too.
Oh my! A fairy? Are you from the drama club?
Will the orb of light be playing with us too? There's a legend in my town that orbs of light can grant wishes.
Hello over there! Is that some sort of camcorder? Are we on tape?
Of course there's no one I'm closer to me than my dear hus--- ah, I mean--- house band. That's right. You could say I'm the house band's number one fan.

condition.saying: only to taste leftover rice and tofu

case.state: That sounds delicious, Shamiko! I hope you don't mind if I borrow your recipe idea.
I'm type A. Are you one of those people who is really interested in personality types, Moskii? I used to like looking that kind of stuff up when I was younger.
Are you and ~player~ in a club together, Natsuki? That sounds exciting.
Let's introduce ourselves, okay! I'll go first. My name is Sanako Isogai. It's nice to meet you all.
I have a feeling the three of us will have a great time!
Everybody is so cute. I hope we can have fun together.
I don't know about you, but I can't help sneaking a peek when a man is trying to show off. Especially now.
You can read a man's mind when his pants are off. But I think you-know-who was having naughty thoughts long before that.
Someone's feeling frisky to~background.time~. Not that I can blame him.
I haven't tried video games before, but I hear good things. This group seems pretty hip, so could anybody recommend some fun ones for a beginner?

I know I should expect a ~background.if.indoors(room|place)~ with only men would make for an interest in my boobies, but would you mind taking a five minute break? Having you stare are the same time is making me feel a bit nervous.
So is this how you all normally spend your ~background.time~ on a ~Weekday~?
I like the atmosphere in here. I wonder what it's like when it gets crowded.
It sure is hot here to~background.time~. I hope you don't mind if I fan myself with my skirt, ehehe...
[Hidden line. Increments the glasses collectible counter if Nagisa is absent and at least one other character with a school uniform is present.]
Who, me? Ah, I guess you could say that. But life doesn't end when you have responsibilities. You still get a chance to play around every now and then.
Who, me? I'm sure you wouldn't have heard of Hikarizaka Private High School, Kyoko. It was founded in 1972. The school is at the highest elevation in town, and the view is breathtaking.
I sure do!
Is that so, Nagisa? Who do I remind you of? Someone pretty, I hope.
I do love to dress up! Who would be your club's advisor?
Is there something wrong, Nagisa? I don't have to keep going if it's making you feel uncomfortable.
Sorry, Nagisa, but I need those to complete my look. So I guess it's time to go all in, ehehe!
My school? Oh, of course. The faculty all seem lovely, and their academic results are among the best in the prefecture. I think any parent would be happy to send their child there.
Me already? If you insist! What a fun idea this is! I wouldn't even be here if it wasn't for... a friend.
The girl I'm borrowing this shirt from has a bit of a smaller bust. It's feeling a little constricting.
Who wants another look at these matching panties I bought?
Ohoho, you're all insatiable for my treats, aren't you? I might have to play this role more often.
You cheeky ~player.ifMale(boys and girls|girls)~ just want me to reveal all my secrets, don't you?
I hope you're all hungry, because I'll be cooking up some forbidden treats to~background.time~.
I hope you're all as excited about this as I am! Does anyone have any requests before I get started?
You naughty ~player.ifMale(boys and |)~girls want to get me out of my uniform already, don't you? Well you'll just have to wait.
Who, me? I try not to let my emotions get the better of me, so I'm glad to hear that it's working. Just please don't say anything cruel, okay?
You've got an eye for these kinds of things, don't you, Jura? Actually, I borrowed this shirt from... a friend. And it's a little tight around the bust. I'm a size or two bigger than she is.
Me? How exciting! Suddenly my heart is beating at a mile a minute.
Even though I'm just a regular student, I hope it's okay if I take a turn as the teacher and let you know a few things about myself.
Oh, good question, Nonon. Um, it's... it's because I have a big chest. It... it makes the boys say, "whoa mama!" It's definitely not because I'm an actual mama or anything like that.
Ehehe, it's me! I hope you're looking forward to to~background.time~. It's not every day a girl shows off her body when she's in a relationship.
Who, me? I'm an expert in controlling my emotions when I need to. I'm not some shy little girl, and now I'll prove it!
You could say that. I'm my own boss, and even though my group is fairly small, not a day goes by without them telling me how much they love me.
Ah, me? Okay. You'll have to excuse me if I'm not any good at this. I practiced in front of the mirror, but this still my first time in front of multiple people.
The cards picked me! They must know I'm too cool for school.

Doesn't a uniform like this make you nostalgic for your high school days? I think that's true even if you're still in school. I remember racing home on a hot afternoon, eager to cool down any way I could.
Me? That's no problem. Don't worry about me, okay? I'm more experienced than I look.
It's only fair that it's my turn first. I have the most to give.
Sorry to keep you waiting.
It's only fair that it's my turn now. I have the most to give.
I don't mind at all.
It's okay that it's my turn. I am technically winning, after all.
Right!
Could it be you've taken an interest in little ol' me?
Lucky you! That's two in a row for me.
My name is Sanako Isogai. Please call me Sanako.
Oh dear...
It's my first loss, but hopefully not my last.
No problem. Leave it to me.
Lucky you! It's my turn again.
It certainly is hot ~background.if.indoors(in|out)~ here today.
Is it that time already?
These are such nice panties. It seems a shame to take them off.
Oh, you're targeting me first? Even though I have the least to lose?
What?!
So that's it? So that's how it is?!
Me again? My breasts were just excess baggage to you, weren't they?
Me? That's okay. I didn't come here just to dress up.
Are you sure you don't want to make the game last a bit longer? Maybe someone else could go before it's my turn again.
You all are very good at this game!
Oopsie!
I spent years developing these pastries. I can't wait for you to try them.
This really brings back memories.
I haven't met Lady Satsuki, but if she's a good boss then she probably knows the key to happiness is to show even more love than you receive.
Don't worry, Nagisa. My birthday was a little while back.
I am. To tell you the truth, I've been looking forward to showing off my body a little. Normally I only have an audience of one.
Just a moment, honey. It's been a long time since I got to show my panties off to someone new, you know?
So you're saying you're just not that moved at the idea of seeing my chest? Honey, that's okay. In fact, it might be weird if it did excite you. That's the last thing I want to happen, haha...
Not at all! ~player.ifMale(One man is enough for me.|Just showing off a little isn't wrong.)~ Anyway, I hope the rest of you have been looking forward to this at least!
My friend and I do a lot of things together, but actually, she doesn't know I'm here! Ehehe...
Let's take it off instead. I used to turn heads in a swimsuit, you know? Maybe I can still catch a few glances.
So hurtful, Nagisa! Do you really think of me as a senior citizen? Am I old and decrepit in your eyes? Has my age caught up with me all at once?!
I think everyone wants me to keep doing this modeling out of uniform, Nagisa. You wouldn't tell on me, would you?
Of course, you should only take your panties off if you're in a safe environment. This is just some harmless fun, so I'm going to go ahead!
Y-You do? Oh...
You'll just have to wait and see, Kyouko. If you're not licking your lips before long, I'm sure someone else will be.
I wouldn't mind teaching you some things with my clothes still on, Meia. But I don't think everyone else would appreciate it.
I've heard it helps a girl become a good mom too. That and warm hugs.
I'd prefer to be known for my big heart and my yummy pastries. But it is true that I have a nice bust. Would you like to see?
It's easy to see why she was proud of you. You blossomed into a a lovely young woman.
Oh, you know... just some maternal wisdom passed down to me.
Just because I'm taken doesn't mean I can't have a little extra fun now and then, Mari. ~player.ifMale(Boys|Everyone)~ can look but not touch, okay?
Showing some vulnerability can help bring you closer together. Of course, showing a little cleavage doesn't hurt either, ehehe...
Sanako [sanako_kyoko_sk_s2]: Well, my name is Sanako Isogai, but please keep calling me Sanako. I'm in senior year at Hikarizaka. I love cooking up unique treats and my family! That's all!
It's only fair that I take my socks off too.
I'm useless! Nothing but a burden to this game!
Will my shoes be enough? Do you need my socks too?
I want to help in any way that I can. How about I take off my socks too?
I thought I might take off my socks too if that's all right.
Don't you worry about me. I knew what I signed up for.
This is a pretty groovy skirt, isn't it?
I'm just too cool for school, huh? Let's cut loose for a bit then.
I won't blame you if you confess your love to me.
Have you been waiting to see this for all this time?
Of course I normally take off my shirt at home, Joey. How would I wash it if I never took it off?
That's okay. I've been around the whole time. I don't blame you for not noticing me.
Don't sell yourself short, Nagisa. You're every bit as lovely plus more. You just have to believe in yourself as much as I do.
Don't worry so much, Nagisa. I've been eighteen for longer than you'd think.
Sweetheart, I'm getting more than enough attention from everyone else. You just keep being you. I'll always support that.
